title: Missing trait bound for defaulted types parameters should mention them

labels.name: A-diagnostics
labels.description: Area: Messages for errors, warnings, and lints

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: D-confusing
labels.description: Confusing diagnostic error that should be reworked

body:
### Code

```Rust
use ::core::ops::Add;

trait Trait: Add {}
```


### Current output

```Shell
error[E0277]: the size for values of type `Self` cannot be known at compilation time
 --> src/lib.rs:3:14
  |
3 | trait Trait: Add {}
  |              ^^^ doesn't have a size known at compile-time
  |
note: required by a bound in `Add`
 --> /rustc/84c898d65adf2f39a5a98507f1fe0ce10a2b8dbc/library/core/src/ops/arith.rs:77:1
help: consider further restricting `Self`
  |
3 | trait Trait: Add + Sized {}
  |                  +++++++

For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0277`.
```


### Desired output

```Shell
error[E0277]: the size for values of type `Self` cannot be known at compilation time
 --> src/lib.rs:3:14
  |
3 | trait Trait: Add {}
  |                ^ the `Rhs = Self` default type parameter doesn't have a size known at compile-time
  |
note: required by a bound in `Add`
 --> /rustc/84c898d65adf2f39a5a98507f1fe0ce10a2b8dbc/library/core/src/ops/arith.rs:77:1
help: given the default type parameter, this is the same as:
 --> src/main.rs:4:26
  |
4 | trait Trait: Add<Self> {}
  |                 ++++++
help: consider further restricting `Self`
  |
3 | trait Trait: Add + Sized {}
  |                  +++++++

For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0277`.
```

@rustbot modify labels to: +D-confusing
